de.szut.dqi12.cheftrainer.server.parsing

Class PointsParser

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.szut.dqi12.cheftrainer.server.parsing.PointsParser

  • public class PointsParser
extends java.lang.Object
    The PointParser class is used to create a new URL to a sportal webside, from which the points of all players, that realy played, can be parsed.
    Author:
    Alexander Brennecke

    • Method Detail

      • getPlayerPoints

        public static java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,Player>> getPlayerPoints(Match m)

      • getPlayerPoints

        public static java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,Player>> getPlayerPoints(int season,
                                                                                                             int matchday,
                                                                                                             int matchID)
        This method is used, to get the points of all players for a specific match at a specific matchday in a specific season.
        Parameters:
        season - the season, use 2015 for season 2015-2016
        matchday - the matchday, use 1-34 for the bundesliga
        matchID - tha matchID, is a unique ID, that was created by sportal
        Returns:
        a Map, that contains a key for each team of the given season. Each key has a new Map, where the keys are the Player names and the value is a player object.
